Forcing the Portal.name: Forcing the Portal
Forcing the Portal.flavor: You strike two nearby foes, teleporting them apart to create an opening.
Forcing the Portal.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you teleport the target 2 squares. Make a secondary attack.
Forcing the Portal.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Forcing the Portal.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier, and you teleport the target 2 squares. The target must be teleported to a space within 3 squares of the primary target.

Ethereal Hunter.name: Ethereal Hunter
Ethereal Hunter.flavor: Stepping though thin air, you blink back into existence next to your enemies, making them your prey.
Ethereal Hunter.effect: You teleport 5 squares. You must teleport to a square adjacent to at least one enemy. Each enemy adjacent to you grants combat advantage to you and is designated as your quarry until the end of your next turn. The enemies don’t count against your normal limit of one quarry at a time, although you can still deal Hunter’s Quarry damage only once per round.

Feywild Tempest.name: Feywild Tempest
Feywild Tempest.flavor: You travel unseen through the battlefield, materializing to strike at a foe before disappearing and moving on to the next adversary.
Feywild Tempest.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Feywild Tempest.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Feywild Tempest.effect: Teleport 5 squares. Make a secondary attack.
Feywild Tempest.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Feywild Tempest.secondaryAttack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and offhand weapon), two attacks
Feywild Tempest.secondaryeffect: Teleport 5 squares. Make a tertiary attack.
Feywild Tempest.tertiaryTarget: One creature other than the primary and secondary targets
Feywild Tempest.tertiaryAttack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and offhand weapon), two attacks
